about_the_game:
Fight for Survival in the Stone Age

Primage takes you back to the Stone Age, where as a settler, you face wild and unexplored nature. In this survival game, every day brings a new challenge: from building a village, hunting prehistoric animals, to competing with other tribes for resources and territory

Gameplay Full Of Challenges


  • Start as a settler and transform a humble settlement into a developed Stone Age community.
  • Battle wild beasts lurking in the wilderness – from cunning foxes to formidable mammoths.
  • Explore vast, procedurally generated lands, from forests and swamps to deserts and tundras.
  • Discover and utilize the world's resources to create tools, weapons, and shelters.
  • Cooperate or compete with other players, forming alliances or waging wars for dominance.

Game Features


  • Dynamic World: The game world dynamically changes with the seasons, weather, and day-night cycle, affecting gameplay.
  • Unique Crafting System: Create tools, weapons, and items from resources found in the game world.
  • Advanced Hunting System: Face different animal species, from small rodents to giant beasts.
  • Building and Managing Settlement: Develop your settlement by recruiting settlers, constructing structures, and managing resources.
  • Social Interactions: Form alliances, trade, or compete with other online players.
  • Realistic Environment: Explore an authentic and rich world of the Stone Age.
  • Diverse Missions and Tasks: Take on challenges and accomplish goals to develop your character and settlement.
  • Skill System and Character Development: Personalize your settler by choosing skills and specializations.
  • Unique Events and Threats: Confront global events and natural disasters.

content_descriptors.notes:
Our game, set in the Stone Age, contains mature content that players should be aware of. This includes:

Violence and Gore: As a survival game, it features hunting and combat with realistic depictions of violence and blood. This includes battles with prehistoric creatures and other human characters, where injuries and deaths are portrayed with a certain degree of realism.

Survival Themes: The game includes survival challenges in harsh environments, which may depict situations of peril and life-threatening scenarios.

Substance Use: There are references to and depictions of primitive forms of substance use, akin to what might be historically accurate for the setting, but no modern drugs or alcohol are featured.

The game does not contain sexual content, sexual assault/non-consensual sex, or themes of self-harm. Our depiction of substance use is limited to historical context without glorifying drug or alcohol abuse.

short_description: As the leader of a Stone Age tribe, gather resources, develop your settlement and lead your people through the challenges of a world full of danger and mystery. Your survival skills, strategic planning and decision-making will be key in this battle for survival.
